segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) provides the following listed set of Windows PowerShell cmdlets.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) provides the following listed set of Windows PowerShell cmdlets.

segment.source: Administrators can use these PowerShell cmdlets to perform various Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring server tasks from the command line rather than from the MBAM administration website.
segment.target: Administrators can use these PowerShell cmdlets to perform various Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring server tasks from the command line rather than from the MBAM administration website.

segment.source: How to Administer MBAM Using PowerShell
segment.target: How to Administer MBAM Using PowerShell

segment.source: Use the PowerShell cmdlets described here to administer MBAM.
segment.target: Use the PowerShell cmdlets described here to administer MBAM.

segment.source: Installs the MBAM features that provide advanced policy, encryption, key recovery, and compliance reporting.
segment.target: Installs the MBAM features that provide advanced policy, encryption, key recovery, and compliance reporting.

segment.source: Removes the MBAM features that provide advanced policy, encryption, key recovery, and compliance reporting tools.
segment.target: Removes the MBAM features that provide advanced policy, encryption, key recovery, and compliance reporting tools.

segment.source: Requests an MBAM recovery key that will enable users to unlock a computer or encrypted drive.
segment.target: Requests an MBAM recovery key that will enable users to unlock a computer or encrypted drive.

segment.source: Provides users with a TPM owner password that they can use to unlock a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) when the TPM has locked them out and will no longer accept their PIN.
segment.target: Provides users with a TPM owner password that they can use to unlock a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) when the TPM has locked them out and will no longer accept their PIN.
